thread.title: Former Secretary of State Albright visits 'Madam Secretary'
thread.title_full: Former Secretary of State Albright visits 'Madam Secretary'

title: Former Secretary of State Albright visits 'Madam Secretary'
text: > Entertainment Former Secretary of State Albright visits 'Madam Secretary' In this image released by CBS, former Secretary of State Madeleine Albright, right, appears in a scene with actress Tea Leoni, who portrays U.S. Secretary of State Elizabeth McCord in an episode of "Madam Secretary." Albright, 78, took a break from teaching duties at Georgetown University to film a guest shot on the show, airing Sunday, Oct. 11, at 8 p.m. EDT on CBS. (Sarah Shatz/CBS via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT; NO ARCHIVE; NO SALES; NORTH AMERICAN USE ONLY.
